member.name: T:Enterprise.Api.Client.Hypermedia.HypermediaDto`1
member.summary: This is a hypermedia result contract that includes the resulting resource representation AND hypermedia links. NOTE: This is technically an envelope object, which breaks REST. TODO: Come back and fix this. Is there a way to do this without an envelope?

member.summary: Contains the URI to be invoked to execute this action.
